price: 87. Bakozuaka lisalisi te, longola sé oyo akozua elaka na Ar-Rahmán.
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
